SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT
TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,(select FN_MEMBER_NAME(b.member_seq) from tb_lc_work b where TLM.com_code = b.com_code) as MEMBER_NM ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CI ,TLM.PL_M_NAME ,FN_PL_M_Z_ID(TLM.PL_M_Z_ID) AS PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TLM.COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,FN_PL_M_Z_ID(TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO) AS PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS COM_REG_DATE ,case when CONCAT(TO_CHAR((com_reg_date::date + interval '14 day') - (NOW()::date), 'DD'), '일') = '일' then '' else CONCAT(TO_CHAR((com_reg_date::date + interval '14 day') - (NOW()::date), 'DD'), '일') end COM_REG_DATE_LIMIT ,CASE WHEN TLM.CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN '확인' ELSE '미확인' END CHK_YN ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_APP_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE AS ORIGIN_PAY_DATE ,TO_DATE(TLM.PAY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',TLM.PL_HIST_CD) AS PL_HIST_CD_NM ,TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('2','5') -- 처리상태가 승인요청, 보완 AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1'
)Z
AND Z.COM_CODE = CAST(#{comCode} AS INTEGER)
AND Z.MEMBER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberNm},'%')
AND Z.CHK_YN = #{chkYn}
AND Z.PL_CLASS = #{plClass}
AND Z.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND Z.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND Z.PL_M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND Z.PL_M_Z_ID LIKE '%' || #{plMZId} || '%'
AND Z.PL_CELLPHONE LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND Z.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND Z.PL_MERCHANT_NO LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantNo} || '%'
AND Z.COM_REG_DATE >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND Z.COM_REG_DATE <= #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
